body_html:
Hi,

Just noticed the issue. I have modified some code for LU in lu_op.cc. Is this related to this issue?
The tensorflow ops code:
https://github.com/zhuangh/tensorflow/blob/1f6d70444866f08b46ae8c3243893bf1e5b54776/tensorflow/core/kernels/lu_op.cc
where L, U, P, Q can be reused, A = P^-1 LU Q^-1

The script of using this ops: https://gist.github.com/zhuangh/6831ac69ffc70e0add7378c1c7764347#file-lu_ops_test-py

@mccajm

body:
Hi,

Just noticed the issue. I have modified some code for LU in lu_op.cc. Is this related to this issue?
The tensorflow ops code:
https://github.com/zhuangh/tensorflow/blob/1f6d70444866f08b46ae8c3243893bf1e5b54776/tensorflow/core/kernels/lu_op.cc
where L, U, P, Q can be reused, A = P^-1 LU Q^-1

The script of using this ops: https://gist.github.com/zhuangh/6831ac69ffc70e0add7378c1c7764347#file-lu_ops_test-py

 @mccajm
